meta.title: Project Needs Assessment
meta.subtitle: Help me understand your project requirements in detail - takes about 2-3 minutes
meta.description: Answer these questions to get a personalized estimate and project timeline. All fields are secure and your information is never shared.

q1.question: What type of website do you need?
q1.subtitle: This helps me understand the complexity, features required, and development timeline

options.label: Landing Page
options.description: Single page to showcase a product/service

options.label: Business Website
options.description: 5-10 pages: Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Contact

options.label: E-commerce Store
options.description: Online store with product catalog and checkout

options.label: Booking/Appointment System
options.description: Calendar system for reservations or appointments

options.label: Web Application
options.description: Custom functionality, user accounts, dashboards

options.label: Not Sure Yet
options.description: I need help figuring this out

q1.helpNote: Not sure? Choose 'Business Website' for most small business needs

q2.question: Do you have your content ready?
q2.subtitle: Content includes text, images, logos, brand colors, and any existing marketing materials

options.label: Yes, Everything is Ready
options.description: Text, images, logos, all organized and provided

options.label: Partially Ready
options.description: I have some content but need help organizing/optimizing

options.label: I Need Help Creating Content
options.description: I need guidance on what content to create

options.label: I Need Full Content Creation
options.description: Professional copywriting, image sourcing, branding

q2.helpNote: Don't worry if content isn't ready - I can help you create professional content

q3.question: Do you need competitor analysis?
q3.subtitle: Understanding your competitors helps create a website that stands out and converts better

options.label: Yes, Detailed Analysis
options.description: Research 5-10 competitors: design, pricing, features, positioning

options.label: Yes, Basic Overview
options.description: Quick review of 2-3 main competitors

options.label: No, I Know My Market
options.description: I already understand my competition

options.label: Not Sure
options.description: Let's discuss if this would help

q3.helpNote: Recommended for new businesses or rebranding efforts

q4.question: What level of SEO do you need?
q4.subtitle: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) helps your website rank higher on Google and get found by potential customers

options.label: Basic SEO
options.description: Google Analytics, Search Console, meta tags, sitemap
options.impact: Essential SEO foundation (included in all projects)

options.label: Advanced SEO
options.description: Keyword research, competitor analysis, content optimization

options.label: Local SEO
options.description: Google My Business, local directories, location targeting

options.label: Enterprise SEO
options.description: Technical SEO audit, schema markup, performance optimization
options.impact: Comprehensive SEO strategy and ongoing optimization

q5.question: What do you want to track?
q5.subtitle: Understanding visitor behavior helps you grow

options.label: Visitor Numbers
options.description: How many people visit your site

options.label: User Behavior
options.description: What pages they visit, how long they stay, where they click

options.label: Conversions & Goals
options.description: Track form submissions, purchases, sign-ups

options.label: Heatmaps & Recordings
options.description: See exactly how users interact with your site

options.label: Advanced Analytics
options.description: Custom dashboards, A/B testing, detailed reports

options.label: Just the Basics
options.description: Simple visitor tracking is enough

q6.question: What level of animations do you want?
q6.subtitle: Animations enhance user experience but affect complexity

options.label: No Animations
options.description: Clean, simple, fast-loading pages

options.label: Simple Animations
options.description: Fade-ins, smooth scrolling, hover effects

options.label: Moderate Animations
options.description: Slide-ins, parallax effects, animated transitions
options.impact: Engaging user experience, moderate development time

options.label: Advanced Animations
options.description: Complex interactions, custom animations, micro-interactions
options.impact: Premium feel, requires additional development time

options.label: Showcase-Level Animations
options.description: Award-worthy animations, cinematic effects, 3D elements

q7.question: Will you sell products or services?
q7.subtitle: This determines if you need e-commerce functionality

options.label: No, Just Information
options.description: Showcase only, no selling functionality needed

options.label: Link to External Store
options.description: I already sell elsewhere (Etsy, Amazon, etc.)

options.label: Yes, Under 20 Products
options.description: Small product catalog with simple checkout
options.impact: Basic e-commerce setup with payment gateway

options.label: Yes, 20-100 Products
options.description: Medium catalog with categories and filters

options.label: Yes, 100+ Products
options.description: Large catalog with advanced features

options.label: Services, Not Products
options.description: I offer services with optional booking/payment
options.impact: Service showcase with optional booking integration

q8.question: How many languages do you need?
q8.subtitle: Multilingual sites help you reach more customers

options.label: Just One Language
options.description: Single language is enough for my market

options.label: Two Languages
options.description: Bilingual website (e.g., English + Italian)

options.label: Three Languages
options.description: Trilingual website for broader reach

options.label: 4+ Languages
options.description: International audience targeting

q9.question: What design approach do you prefer?
q9.subtitle: Design affects both timeline and cost

options.label: Template-Based
options.description: Start with a proven design, customize branding
options.impact: Fastest delivery, lower cost, professional result

options.label: Inspired by Examples
options.description: Show me sites you like, I'll create something similar
options.impact: Semi-custom design, balanced timeline and cost

options.label: Fully Custom Design
options.description: Unique design tailored to your brand from scratch

options.label: Premium Custom Design
options.description: Award-worthy design with multiple revision rounds

options.label: No User Accounts Needed
options.description: Public website, no login required

options.label: Simple Login
options.description: Basic user accounts with profile management

options.label: Advanced User System
options.description: Roles, permissions, user dashboards, content access

options.label: Social Login
options.description: Login with Google, Facebook, etc.

q11.question: When do you need this launched?
q11.subtitle: Timeline affects planning and pricing

options.label: ASAP (1-2 weeks)
options.description: Rush project, needs immediate attention
options.impact: Rush fee applies, limited revision rounds

options.label: Soon (2-4 weeks)
options.description: Standard timeline for most projects

options.label: Flexible (1-2 months)
options.description: No rush, quality is priority
options.impact: More time for refinement and testing

options.label: Just Planning (3+ months)
options.description: Researching options, not ready to start yet
options.impact: Time for thorough planning and strategy
